section.name: System Environment
section.p: To use eFaps, following software must be installed and be ready to use:

dir.li: Tomcat 5.5 used as Web Application Server
Maven 2 used as Software Project Management and Comprehension tool

section.name: Development Environment
section.p: If a development on eFaps is planned, also SubVersion must be installed (see also the project information about the source repository).

section.name: Download of eFaps
section.p: eFaps must be downloaded. Two different possibilities exists:

dir.li: Download from the eFaps Web Site and unpack
Check out from the SCM repository with SubVersion
